text: Patrice Munsel (May 14, 1925 - August 4, 2016) was an American coloratura soprano. She was the youngest singer who ever starred at the Metropolitan Opera. She was sometimes called "Princess Pat". Munsel was born in Spokane, Washington on May 14, 1925.The Dictionary of Opera, Charles Osborne, Macdonald & Co., London, England She died on August 4, 2016 in Schroon Lake, New York, aged 91. ==References== ==Other websites== *Cover of Time magazine, December 3, 1951 *Article in Time magazine, December 3, 1951 * Cover of Life magazine, March 3, 1952 *Metropolitan Opera's "Opera News Online" *Patrice Munsel personal website Category:1925 births Category:2016 deaths Category:American stage actors Category:American opera singers Category:People from Spokane, Washington Category:Singers from Washington (state) Category:American sopranos
title: Patrice Munsel
